Name: Australian Lesbian and Gay Archives Inc

About.Hours & facilities: Open Thurs 7-9pm; by arrangement at other times. General reference assistance available. Copying services for books, journals and original records to A3 available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Acquisition focus: The Archives collects and preserves any material produced by lesbians and gay males which reflect their lives and experiences. We also collect and preserve any material produced by non-gay people or groups which refer to gay and lesbian lifestyles. The collection focuses on Australasia but has selected overseas material.

Contact.Street address: Victorian AIDS Council, 6 Claremont Street, South Yarra Vic 3141
